name: Determination
description: Increases Endurance by 3 for each level.

name: Salubrity
description: Increases Health by 4 for each level.

name: Gain Gold to Test
description: Gain 3 gold for each level, every time you actvate this ability.

name: Survivalism
description: Increases survivalism by 1 for each level.

name: Piety
description: Increases divinity by 1 for each level.

name: Sagacious
description: Increases experience gained by 5% for each level.

name: Panther Aspect
description: Increases evade chance by 1% for each level.

name: Camouflage
description: Increases stealth by 1% for each level.

name: Luck
description: Increases luck by 2 for each level.

name: Iron Bark
description: Increases defence by 2% for each level.

name: Wreath of Flames
description: Increases fire damage by 3 for each level.

name: Blessed
description: Increases devotion by 5 for each level.
